catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 526
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: small book bound in faded gold brocade with blue flowers; pages of small, delicate cursive calligraphy
inscription: at end: (I have written this Ise Monogatari on order and with shameless crudity, inking my worn-out brush. Autumn, Kambun 2.)
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
title: The Tale of Ise
